reviews.review: This was another game i haven't played the 1st or 2nd of but now want to.   Another gift for birthday about 2 years back while its been sitting in my steam library for that long, which iv been finally getting around to playing a couple of them lately as I also have an xbox one, ps3, and maintain a couple accounts on some mmorpg's.   I plan to play this game another time possibly on hard and get more achievements.

No início não fez o menor sentido em relação aos títulos anteriores. Na verdade não existe relação até os últimos minotos de campanha, onde Elizabeth abre uma fenda para Rapture explicando que era um dos mundos que ela tem acesso. Ainda assim, no início do jogo uma voz feminina diz que a criação de Columbia foi após a queda de "sodoma" no fundo do mar... Achei um tanto quanto complexa a história desta versão.
Pelo game se passar anos antes do primeiro título, há bastante sentido em terem tirado alguns benefícios de jogabilidade, mas achei bem complicado no início, levando em consideração que já havia me acostumado no 1 e 2 da franquia (Não há armazenagem de kits médicos ou poção de "magias" - Não há munições diferentes para cada arma - Só é possível carregar 2 armas por vez - Apenas 2 vigores por vez, ainda que possa ser trocado durante o jogo - Entre outras mudanças drásticas).
A jogabilidade é muito boa e qualidade de imagem, mesmo na configuração mínima, excepcional. A dificuldade é muito menor em relação aos demais títulos, os momentos de ação s~so bem raros, mas muitos deles emocionantes. Contudo, eu gostei bastante de jogá-lo e recomendo. Tanto que irei jogar novamente, porém no modo 1999.
A beautiful game with a great story.

A single player masterpiece, amazing atmosphere and intense moments in the story makes you never want to quit.
Sadly the story feels a bit short, but the gameplay itself is extremely good.

This was a really well made game with a lot of unexpected twists and turns that came full circle thanks to the DLCs. I was convinced for most of the game that this was essentially a reboot, and I had done absolutely no research on the series to back up that theory, though I did notice some parallels between the first two games and Infinite such as the whole imprinting of the Songbird to Elizabeth and the Little Sisters with Big Daddies, Vigors to Plasmids, Eve to Salts, though at first I dismissed them as concepts that worked for the foundation of a Bioshock title that would work under my reboot theory, just reused under different names. It wasn't until I got to the end of the main game and dove into the DLCs that I finally realised that it in fact is NOT a reboot but a prequel. Its not an overly complicated state of affairs if you pay close attention to whats going on, but if you're just rushing through it to shoot shit and blow shit up with powers then you might get lost.

Now I might get lynched by a few of the more die hard Bioshock fans for saying this but I really did enjoy Infinite more than 1 and 2 overall, despite it missing a lot of elements from the first two titles such as hacking, crafting and the ability to pull 50 different guns out your ass while juggling 50 different Plasmids. I found enjoyment in the slightly more simplified mechanics, the story was more engaging, I only really had interest in two of the guns (Sniper and Shotgun) so I was fine with only been able to hold two at a time from the moment I obtained them to the end of the game, Elizabeth opened locked doors for me and all I had to do was find the lockpicks by exploring, the world itself piqued my interest more than Rapture, the constant interactions between Booker and Elizabeth were great at breaking long bouts of silence you might find in a lot of FPP games where you usually play a silent protagonist...made it all feel 'real' and 'human', it gave everything I did meaning, otherwise I just feel like this robot who's doing everything everyone else tells me to do.

Must have taken well over 100 photos during my time playing through the main game and the DLCs, its quite a gorgeous game with some very interesting concepts and design ideas for the environments, weapons, enemies, etc, it all brought the world to life and made for a very engaging experience both in and out of combat situations. I really took my time just looking around instead of bulldozing from one objective to the next, just trying to get as much as I could possibly get done in one playthrough.

Fully recommend to anyone new to the series or anyone who has played 1 and 2 but have yet to play Infinite. The DLCs explains a lot about what happened before the events of the first two titles so those who like a good story or want to witness events in order, play Infinite first before the first two games. A new Bioshock is officially in the works now too, though they say it'll be in development for several years, I'm gonna be looking forward to playing it when it arrives!

I just finished this game. It’s been almost 7 years since this game came out. I didn’t have a good enough computer, or the time, to play it back then.

I knew nothing about Bioshock going in. Since I hadn’t played the previous games in the franchise, I had no idea that it was a commentary on the American way of life, and mostly a critique of it.

I don’t think anyone reads this blog, but if anyone does, I don’t want to give away any spoilers. I can just say that it’s a game absolutely worth playing. You will only spend 12-15 hours playing it. But you’ll be thinking about it for a lot more.

Stick until the end. It will break you.

I will say this: I like to believe that the circle was broken.
Bioshock Infinite is a great game. It aged well and the story is still good and playing through it over a second time is still fun because all that's revealed. I don't regret buying it at all.

五六年前盗版通关，春节大包打折就补了个票，然后没忍住又点开想再玩一遍。
从起床到傍晚八个小时一口气把本体通了，即便已经知道了整个故事，到最终结局还是有被震撼到，注意到了一些当时没注意的细节，捋顺了一些当时没看明白的关系。
我真的很吃伙伴与羁绊这一套，从布克和伊丽莎白到乔尔和艾莉，到老战神与儿子，再到泰坦与铁驭，无论是战斗玩法上的互动还是剧情上的勾连，都让我深切沉浸入角色之中，仿佛屏幕中的另外一人就是自己出生入死的伙伴。
意犹未尽之时想起来还有海葬的DLC可以玩，1+海葬两部曲，未来几天就敲定是你们了。
我觉得很爽

前作までの閉塞感漂う海底都市ラプチャーから、今作の舞台は解放感のある空中都市コロンビアへ！
陰鬱なスチームパンクは明るい狂気へと、世界観がガラリと変わった。

ゲームもシューティング性がぐっと高くなり、アイテム名やボタン配置の変更、マップの廃止など若干あったけれど、前作までのをちゃんと踏襲しているので戸惑うことはない。
また、今作は進行と合わせて敵も手強くなっていく仕様。
そのため中盤以降ともなるとさくさく死ぬけれど、生き返りもさくさくなので、ストレスなく楽しめた。 滅茶苦茶テンポがいいです。

ストーリーについては、ゲーム性やテンポのために犠牲になっているのかと言えば、それは全くの NO 。
今回はマルチエンディングではないけれど、考察好きな人にもってこいと言わんばかりの複雑に入り組んだ物語のため、ストーリー回収のために周回する人もいるんじゃないかと。

そして、今作より日本語吹替も復活！
今回もまた上質な翻訳と吹替に感謝感激でございます（本当に嬉しい）。

ここまでべた褒めなので、 個人的に残念だったところなど（でも『BioShock Infinite』に限った事ではない）。

・オートセーブのみの対応となった（好きな時に止められない）。

オートセーブ問題は個人の好き好きとして、字幕問題は探してみたら解決法を押してくれている方がいました。

As a whole the entire Bioshock series is my favorite of all time. Infinite in particular is great. While the story can be a bit busy it is certainly worth the ride. I remember getting it day one at my local Gamestop, and faked sick to stay home from school to play it. It has been long enough now that the replay I just experienced had me relive the same jaw drop that my first play through gave me all those years ago. If you have not played this series yet, it is a disservice to yourself and you should feel shamed...

[h1]Decent Game, Didn't Feel Like a Bioshock Game[/h1]

All in all, I'd say I was somewhat disappointed with Bioshock Infinite after playing the first two games. While it managed to maintain an excellent atmosphere, the graphics and environment were absolutely stunning, I have multiple complaints about the gameplay.

For starters, the Shield mechanic just felt out of place for the setting, This isn't DOOM or Halo so having an energy shield in addition to the standard health bar. I also have problems with the gunplay. Since when did we have to look down sights in a bioshock game? In addition, unlike the previous two games you'll find many of your weapons outclassed, after the first few levels the pistol and sky-hook were way under-classed, which was disappointing to me because I got through most of the first two games using plasmids and the wrench/drill. 

There's also the problem of being unable to carry first aid kits and salt phials with you like you could with the Kits and EVE hypos. This lead to far more cautious shooting than I did in the last games, only exacerbated by the fact that you can only carry two guns at a time as opposed to the ability to carry all of your weapons with you. Whether this was a stylistic choice I don't know, all I know is that it made some parts of the game and getting some achievements annoying.

I'm also not sure the whole multiple reality thing really fits in with this universe, or perhaps multiverse in this case. Was it interesting? yes and some of the ways it was incorporated into the gameplay were very well done, but it still doesn't feel right for this series, at least to me. I feel like the whole multiple universe thing has become a bit tropey with how often it's  used these days.

In addition, the enemy variety was somewhat disappointing as well, instead of a variety of splicers used in Rapture all throughout the first two games, the games enemies rarely get past "another guy with a gun" whether it's the police, soldiers or motorized patriots, they all felt very similar, as opposed to the variety you saw in Rapture with Spider and Houdini Splicers, All of the Big Daddies, Big Sisters, Brutes and what have you, all of which have a different attack pattern and way of defeating them whereas the enemies in infinite seem to use the same tactics for the most part, but occasionally having a different gun.

Now Let's get to some of the things I did like. For starters, I liked how the game made it a point not to feel like one long escort mission after you rescue Elizabeth from the tower. She gives you items and you don't have to spend your entire time protecting her (the game even makes it a point to tell you this), it makes her feel more like your partner in this adventure as opposed to just being a load your entire way. You actually feel it in levels when she isn't with you because the game because significantly more difficult when she's not around, demonstrating to you just how much you've been relying on her over the course of the game.

In addition, I enjoyed several of the characters I encountered such as Elisabeth, the Luteces and most of the characters whose audio logs are scattered throughout the game. They were fairly well developed with understandable motivations rather than feeling like their entire existence in the plot was to make a point.

also, as said earlier, they did a good job making the flying city of Columbia feel like an inhabited city as opposed to the the lonely, slowly collapsing rapture, and there is some reflection of that, where Rapture was made of cramped enclosed spaces that hammered in that you were deep under the sea, Columbia has wide open level design appropriate for the flying city. 

The abilities you get from the plasmids, sorry "vigors" are genuinely interesting and unique rather than just being a repeat of the same abilties you could purchase in the first two games, if anything I was only disappointed by how little the selection was. My favorites were the Murder of Crows and Undertow vigors (because  sending a bunch of crows after your enemies is way cooler than reenacting the whole "NOT THE BEES!" meme). I like how each new vigor you got had a transformation sequence that was reminiscent of when you grabbed your first plasmid in the previous games, though some of them were a bit graphic and made me feel sympathy pain.

Overall I'd give Bioshock infinite a 7 out of 10, because in spite of it's flaws it's still enjoyable, I was just disappointed when comparing it to the previous games.

Bioshock Infinite, such a divisive title. Although not living up to the Bioshock name, its absolutely worth a playthrough. The story, characters, and setting are interesting. But this isn't a sim like experience. It's a linear fps experience, and if that not your cup of tea. It'll be hard for you to enjoy what this game has to offer. Overall i really liked this game and the story i still remember after playing years later. 8/10 I just wish it was more than what we got.
游戏是好游戏，只是对win10的兼容性太差，经常闪退，建议切换输入法+窗口化进行游玩。 但不得不说“无限”真的很难相信是一款2013年的游戏，无论是游戏性还是剧情，都十分的有野心。 本来bioshock系列就难以突破，但：无限“毫无疑问的做到了，并且对系列画上了完美的句号，更加立体的角色，更加智能的AI，无与伦比的美丽景色，不得不让人感叹这款作品真是个艺术。
Its a great continuation of the Bioshock franchise and it really ties everything together. One of my favorite replays.

재밌어요 . 전투가 재밌습니다. 스토리는 좀 혼란스럽네요. 과학과 비과학을 섞은 스토리라고 할까나. 길찾기요소 여전히 있구요. 1회차였는데 길찾다가 좀 헤멘부분도 있습니다. 레일타고 돌아다닐때 신나기도 하고 정신사납고 . 무기가 권총, 기관총, 산탄총, 저격라이플, 수류탄발사기 등등 여러가지 나오구요. 근접무기도 있는데 전투할 때는 마법하고 원거리 무기만 주로 썼습니다. 난이도는 1회차 기준으로 좀 있다고 봅니다. 항상은 아니지만 후반 맵중에 유령의집 분위기도 있으니 무서운거 못하는 사람들은 참고하시길. 바이오쇼크 1, 2편에서는 볼 수 없었던 초자연적인 현상이 나옵니다.  그러나 재밌습니다. 그래픽 깔끔하게 좋은 편이고 전투도 재밌고 마법쓰는 재미도 쏠쏠합니다. 돈모으는 재미, 무기 모으는 재미, 업그레이드하는 재미, 길찾는 재미, 레일타고 누비는 재미등등 전편들과 가장 큰 차이점들 중의 하나는 극초반을 빼면 거의 항상 엘리자베스와 함께라는 점입니다. 이 게임의 히로인이죠. 엘리자베스의 도움없이는 게임을 깨기 어려울 정도이죠.  그리고 항상 기술을 바꿀 수가 있습니다. 패시브와 액티브 기술 둘 다 말이죠. 무기는 2개만 들고 다닐 수가 있어서 선택이 항상 아쉽습니다. 3개만 들고 다닐 수 있게 했으면 난이도가 많이 떨어질텐데 2개만 들고 다니다 보니 다른 무기가 아쉬울 때가 많습니다. 그래도 엘리자베스가 총알도 주고 소금도 주고 체력회복도 주니 할만합니다. 그럼 이만.

Easily one of the best Video Games of all time. Bioshock 1 may have an arguably better Atmosphere, but the mixture of Politics and Religion, and how they are so easily woven into Booker and Columbia's pasts, have resulted in one of the greatest examples of Video Games serving as an Art form. Just WOW.

先说结论：是一款足够优秀的好作品，同时，离神作尚有差距。但是，依然非常非常值得你花费10多个小时的时间，去沉浸体验。


关于游戏本身的优劣，已经有太多评价，不再细说，只简要概括：蒸汽朋克、空中之城、平行宇宙理论等元素的糅合，足够优秀的线性剧本叙事，足够优秀的人物设定；不足：作为一款FPS游戏，枪支元素不足，怪物类型单调。

但是好在，游戏主打的也并非是FPS。我更愿意说，它是一款第一人称视角的冒险故事，重在叙事。射击要素只是次要的、附着的战斗形式。

总结：电影叙事爱好者，请进；FPS硬核玩家，慎入。

First playthrough: 8h 6m

This review is rather bare when compared to all of the good things I'd like to mention about BioShock Infinite. This is due to a majority of the pros I have in mind relate to the story, and I don't want to spoil anybody.

Pros-
+Disgustingly beautiful art style and world, still looks better than most games that release today
+Quality combat loop as per, swapping between weapons constantly and using Vigors to throw all sorts of elements at foes. The guns in particular feel like they have weight to them when compared to the previous two games
+Interesting loot/gear/equipment system in place compared to previous titles, alongside a new way to manoeuvre around the world with the hook
+The pacing is immaculate, it introduces new concepts, enemies and environments at the perfect times that will make it hard to stop playing at times 

Cons-
-Mouse sensitivity isn't consistent between sprinting and walking even after fixes
-Aim assist is really strong when aiming down site even after fixes
-One of the coolest boss fights on paper is dampened by not-so-fun gameplay mechanics 

[b]Rating: 3.5/5[/b]

I used to watch my brother play this game as a little kid and I hated it. Now that I actually understood what was beeing said I can safely say this will forever be in my top 5 games.
(excuse the typos and that stuff. i just cant be bothered to make something super professional on a fucking steam review)
The combat:
If you're looking for an FPS with a cool ''magic'' system then buy it. The guns are really fun to use, and it only gets enhanced by the vigors. Vigors are sort of magical abilities that you unlock through the course of the game. They all serve a different purpose in combat although some felt less creative or fun to use but that never really bothered me. Although you kinda have to mix things up often so you dont always use the OP once.
Guns are ''the same'' as vigors in a sense that they all are very much different with pros and cons to each. The game is also very welcome to embrace different playstyles with the mixing of vigors and guns. Honestly the combination of guns and vigors feel endless and that kept the combat from getting boring every single hour of a total of fifteen.
10/10

The Story:
the story is both confusing and very easy to follow. But it doesn't get confusing until the end, but the end only brought me more questions about the world of bioshock than answers which most of the time is a bad thing. But here I loved that the game had me lay the final puzzle pieces for how the story really ended, and the game clearly wants you to think. 
Sadly this game has a voiced character... BUT in this game it works PERFECTLY. The journey that Booker and Elizabeth go on is both engaging and action-packed fun which always left me wanting to learn more about them. Although I couldnt care less for some of the characters and the world of infinite. Overall it was a very interesting story with characters that left me quite litteraly dreaming of them but some(tbh most) left me extremely dull.
8/10

The Graphics:
Honestly I couldnt give a fuck about how the game looked I would enjoy it just the same. But you probably do and lucky for you the game looks amazing. With a good PC you can play most of the game on high settings. on a budget you can make Normal work but that depends on how old/well kept it is. But the best part is that even if you're playing on a AAA battery powered potato you can play this game on low settings. which makes this a perfect budget game for budget gamers with its truly amazing Combat and Story to complement the graphics. But the facial animations for normal npc can get a bit uncanny which did break my immersion the smallest bit if even at all.
9/10

Overall: 9/10
This game kept me on my toes for 15 hours straight and theres even more to do with a even harder difficulty mode and dlc left for me to play. I've fallen in love with this game and I think you will too. If you ever see this on a sale buy it, if not, still, BUY THIS GAME IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
Fantastic Story, Burial at sea is a great addition, less run and gun and more stealth oriented

Thematically beautiful and (sometimes) very very fun, it's unfortunately a step back from it's predecessors in terms of content. That being said, I enjoy dipping back into it from time to time, and I have fun playing it, so I'd be lying if I said it wasn't worth a purchase. Grab it on sale  and blow through it for some good times.
nicee
I am going through the story, right now I beaten Slate so far. Its going very well. I'm enjoying the game!
Profond et trés mind fuck au niveau du scénario, mais l'un de mes jeux préféré. simplement magnifique

Великолепная игра   с  интересным сюжетом, героями, городом в небесах, полетами и боями  на аэротрассах и очаровательной Элизабет )
Концовка - это  вообще взрыв мозга, еще долго приходишь в себя, сидишь и пытаешься все осознать, собрать  из мозаики общую картину  :)))
Также отличные  два DLC Burial at Sea, которые органично переплетают историю Infinite  с Биошок 1 и 2

많이는 안해봤지만 게임이 내적으로나 외적으로나 
정말 퀄리티 높게 잘만들어졌고 
무엇보다도 재미가있다. 
재미가 없었으면 추천을 안하징
Tablo gibi oyun.
This game I can play over and over again. Such a great title to the series. Get this if you haven't yet!

Simplesmente, jogão! A história é complexa e intrigante, jogabilidade divertida e personagens carismáticos. A arte, claro, linda até hoje, Norte que eu não escrevi gráficos, Foi arte mesmo!
Único problema do jogo é que ele acaba, e logo. A campanha principal pode ser finalizada em algo entorno de 12h. Mas a DLC "Enterro no mar" dá mais uma 04 ou 05h de história. Recomendo comprar com esta DLC, pois a história está diretamente ligada aos eventos dos jogos anteriores e é muito boa.
Самая любимая игра!
отличная игра
Пожалуй, одна из лучших сюжетных игр в которые мне доводилось играть. Советую брать вместе с обоими эпизодами Burial at Sea(DLC)
偏剧情向的第一人称设计类游戏，作者脑洞及大，所有悬疑都在游戏的最后一幕才揭开。游戏结束后，仍意犹未尽，始终觉得一开始或许不应该去“拯救”伊丽莎白。除了剧情以外，此作的Npc队友伊丽莎白，是我玩的游戏中见过的最最最强力的NPc队友，你缺啥，她就给你扔啥。并不会觉得战斗时带着累赘。总之，值得一玩，值得细细体会。
真的是一款神作，没得说简直完美，只是最后剧情有点没看懂，来回穿梭........

There's always a lighthouse. There's always a man. There's always a city.
And it shall always end in tears.
Ни-х-уя не понял, но очень интересно!

Das mit großem Abstand beste Spiel aller Zeiten, wenn es um Story und Atmosphäre geht.
Auch die Grafik besticht nach Jahren noch immer und wird dem Test der Zeit stand halten.
Für JEDEN (all Genders) ein MUST-Play, der auf wirklich gut erzählte Geschichten, Retro-Feeling und dynamisches Gameplay steht. Klare 10/10 Punkten.
游戏越后期越好玩，尤其在平民窟剧情初次拉开的时候
伊丽莎白真香！！！冲！！！

I had bought this game 6 separate times. 1 time on my old pc and lost the copy, other times on different steam accounts, once for ps4 and had to sell it . Its the only game that always with me , wherever I go.  I love it with all my heart. Yes there are issues that I do not like, like when you are revived constantly. It loses some of difficulty. 

The story should be simply summed up : How much you are going to sin , in order to achieve redemption?

[h1] 绝对绝对的神作 [/h1]
直接困难难度全程打下来，几个很难的boss我也找到了一个bug的地点让你可以单方向迎敌而不会被贴脸（敌人不会过来）
剧情方面人物形象塑造很好，主角态度的转变和伊丽莎白一开始对主角的陌生→信任→闹脾气→信任→引领主角，整个流程下来跌宕起伏，你永远不会想到你接下来面对的是多少敌人，门的背后究竟有什么，到最后接触对伊丽莎白能力的束缚之后，开始引领主角逐渐找回失去的记忆和过去的事，[spoiler] 原来伊丽莎白是我失散多年的女儿呜呜 [/spoiler]
至于一些特别难的关卡，找到一些位置，比如销售机附近（母亲第三次灵魂，敌人是不会过来的；打第一次灵魂可以到一个右边的一个小房子里，那里敌人也不会过来只会在门口；还有打第二次灵魂的时候也可以怂在金库门口不要进去，拿着狙慢慢打头，所以狙击枪在这游戏很好用，出了爱国者还有火箭筒兵还有一些大怪物，没有什么不是大头一枪死不了的，记得穿戴可以影响附近的套装，每死一个人基本上可以电住四周所有的敌人。
以上就是我的体验，建议正常难度，这样子打的舒服一些，剧情可以细细品，绝对值得一玩的神作。
One of the best immersion games I have ever played. Must play for the story and fun.
